entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Farnham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C

Observed at: Granby 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
